Title: Endoscopic therapy and beta-blockers for secondary prevention in adults with cirrhosis and oesophageal varices
Abstract: © 2017 The Cochrane Collaboration. Published by John Wiley & Sons, Ltd.This is a protocol for a Cochrane Review (Intervention). The objectives are as follows: To evaluate the beneficial and harmful effects of endoscopic therapy and beta-blockers used as a combination therapy versus monotherapy with either endoscopic therapy or beta-blockers for secondary prevention in people with cirrhosis and oesophageal varices.
